song_lyrics: Māharu bhāgya atishe ja adaku thayu,
Tan taṇā tāp santāp sarave ṭaḷyā,
Tan dhan jagat shu prīt toḍī °1
Asat sukh paraharī Nāth tamane varī,
Dehaḍī jāy paṇ neh nav chhuṭajo,
title: Māharu bhāgya atishe ja adaku thayu

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-70: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Prabhatiya
